cause.description:
Carbonfund.org is dedicated to fighting climate change, making it easy and affordable for anyone to eliminate their climate impact and hastening the transformation to a clean energy and technology future. We promote cost-effective solutions to carbon reductions that include saving energy and carbon offsets
1. Climate change education Carbonfund.org educates the public about the dangers of climate change and cost-effective solutions to our climate crisis.
2. Carbon reductions and offsets Carbonfund.org promotes cost-effective ways to save energy and makes it easy and affordable for anyone to offset their remaining carbon footprint.
3. Outreach to the public._Carbonfund.org promotes organizations that are leading in the fight against climate change, along with innovative ideas aimed at reducing carbon dioxide emissions globally.
cause.mission: Our goal is to help drive the price of clean technology - like wind energy - to below dirty technology - like coal- and hasten the transformation to a clean energy future.
cause.name: Carbon Fund
